amendment.description: To provide for the conveyance of land located in Hopkinton, New Hampshire.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4316 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4316 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Gregg. (consideration: CR S6377-6392; text: CR S6388-6389) To provide for the conveyance of land located in Hopkinton, New Hampshire.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4316 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Gregg.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4316 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
